snippet: Penguins forward Carl Hagelin hopes a recent uptick in offensive production can lead to a surge in the second half of the season....
lead_paragraph: Penguins forward Carl Hagelin hopes a recent uptick in offensive production can lead to a surge in the second half of the season.

headline.main: Hagelin Helps Penguins Rally Past Hurricanes
headline.print_headline: Hagelin Helps Penguins Rally Past Hurricanes
